effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Warmongering Gladiator's Dragonhide Helm

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 157 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 157, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 498 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 498 over 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

When you fall below 35% health, gain 10 Avoidance for 15 sec, and your next Ironfur will last 70% longer. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

Azerite energy courses through your veins, increasing maximum health by 44 every 5 sec, stacking up to 10 times. While at maximum stacks, heal for 17 health every 5 sec.

Gain a stack of Anima of Life when you kill an enemy that yields experience or honor.

This effect is lost if you fall below 35% health.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Reduce Sanity loss within the Visions of N'Zoth by 80%.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Agility by 506 for 15 sec. Requires the Heart of Azeroth. (Requires level 50 or below)
Use: Dispel any effects of N'Zoth's Corruption, and become immune to any further Corruption effects for 6 sec. (3 Min Cooldown)
